title: Can we brush teeth & use soap DURING Wudu? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] says can we apply soap 
brush the teeth during ablution   we know that ablution has 6 pillars what are these 
pillars number 1 washing the face which includes   turning the water in your mouth and sniffing 
the water up your nostrils and blowing it out   number 2 washing your arms from the beginning 
of your fingertips till your elbows including   your elbows number 3 wiping over your head 
which includes also wiping your ears number 4   washing your feet including 
the ankles to the ankles   number 5 the sequence the order so face 
arms head feet number 6 to be simultaneous   meaning that you don't leave a gap and 
the issue of not leaving a gap is relative   so usually brushing the teeth or using the 
miswak is negligible its a minute amount   of time like 30 secs or so or maybe a minute 
but opening the door or answering a phone call   or checking if the food is cooked or 
needs to be turned over or not this breaks   the simultaneousness of your wudu and hence you 
need to repeat it from scratch likewise if you   for example while washing your arms found at that 
there's a barrier so you're engaged in scrubbing   it and washing it with soap that may take sometime 
but its for the purpose of wudu not for something   external so this amount is also exempted without 
any problem and Allah azzawajal knows best
